Pickup Clojure and ClojureScript

11 Oct 2015

Clojure is a Lisp dialect that targets the JVM. It is a compiled language with optional type hints and type inference. It can interop with existing Java libraries. ClojureScript is Clojure targeting JavaScript.

Setup a blog on GitHub with Jekyll

18 Sep 2015

Jekyll is a static site generator designed for generating blog. GitHub Pages support Jekyll natively.
